name: ChemistryUpdatebyC&EN
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Chemistry Update, a daily flash briefing from Chemical & Engineering News, includes three short news briefs each weekday and a weekend roundup of the most interesting briefs of the previous week. 

Whether you listen in the morning when you’re getting dressed or in the afternoon while you’re taking a break from the lab bench, you’ll get caught up on the latest from C&EN fast. To try it out right now, enable Chemistry Update by C&EN from your Alexa app, and then say, “Alexa, what’s in the news?”
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
